name: World Water Day Landing Page
description:
Hey folks!

I was reading up a few articles and looking at some documentaries regarding the effect of human civilisation on marine life. Not gonna lie, what I found out was eye opening. Hundreds of underwater species have either gone extinct or thriving at the brink of extinction, mostly due to human intervention.

Therefore, as shoutout to everyone out there, I have come up with a Landing Page concept on World Water Day. Save our water buddies before its too late.
